remarks: The identity value of a trace-preserving endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendoid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendoid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoid.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( S ` ( _I |` B ) ) = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
